reviews.review: this game was good before it was ruined by making it free and then allowing the good community it had to be destroyed by toxic players and cheaters, i hate the fact you get banned because you allow people to kick others out because they are toxic and think its funny and you allow such actions to go and on and on resulting in people getting banned and deranked in game. people who act hard and tuff and are just plain ruining peoples nights by antagonizing other players. The fact that you close the market to people who have not played in awhile or have not bought in a while is also plain stupid. been playing this game since it first was released and I hate it because you allow such toxic behavior to go unchecked, I have a 7 day ban because two toxic players kicked me due to they wanted to troll and be antagonistic to another player just cause they could be, not like you guys care cause  i see it happen all the time with what has happened to others and myself. I would never recommend this game to anyone due to ths type of behavior and toxicity of the people who play it

This game is a true classic. For what it offers it is only rivaled by Valorant. That being said I don't personally enjoy it. You'll know if CS:GO is your cup of tea but it might take you a couple hundred hours of suffering. Not for me personally but to each their own. 

Generally speaking: 4/5
